Plot: Set in the late 60's, broken relationships and an astronomical event intertwine the various narrative threads - an abstract interpretation of the historical Christmas narrative.
Title: Anomaly
Writer: Christopher Gray (screenplay), Christopher Gray (story), Georgie Kelsey (story), Salomon Ligthelm (story), Paul Nevison (additional writing)
Actors: Mike Connell, Jason Zednick, Anthony Michael Lopez, Andrew Sensenig
